column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Thursday July 4 in observance of Independence Day.
Regular traffic reports will resume Friday July 5 at 7:00 a.m.

column4: Street closures scheduled for 4th of July events.
Note:  After the parade, Main St will remain closed between MLK and S Forbes Rd until after the fireworks.
Visit Downtown Lexington for additional event details.
